articles.author: Tatiana Vorozhko
articles.title: Four scenarios for securing peace in Ukraine - Voice of America
articles.description: How four Washington think tanks see the possibility of securing lasting peace in Ukraine
articles.content: WASHINGTON  U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing for a peaceful resolution to Russias now three-year war in Ukraine. VOA examined several approaches floated by think tanks recently aimed at achievi… [+7716 chars]
